#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
int main()
{
     int tcase;
     scanf("%d",&tcase);
     while(tcase--)
     {
          int n,i,d=1;
          scanf("%d",&n);
          int c;
          c=log(n)/log(2);
          for(i=0;i<c;i++)
               d*=2;
          c=2*(n-d)+1;
          printf("%d\n",c);
     }
     return 0;
}
